output: Follow the instructions included with the Deluxe Fire Station LEGO model to assemble it. Make sure to pay close attention to the diagrams and illustrations, as well as the included suggested age range and difficulty level of the model. Begin by grouping the blocks and pieces by color, or by the set of illustrated diagrams you are directed to build from. Connect the pieces according to the diagrams and pictures. Leave no blocks unattached. Once the model is fully assembled, examine the model to make sure it looks like that image in the manual.
